sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SCHWEINFURT, a very ſtrong, free, and imperial town of Germany, in Franconia, with a magnificent palace, where the ſenators meet, who are 12 in number. The environs are rich in cattle, corn, and wine; the inhabitants are Proteſtants, and not very rich. However, they carry on a large trade in woollen and linen cloth, gooſe-quills, and feathers. It is ſeated on the river Main, 27 miles north-eaſt of Wirtz- burg, and 22 well of Bamberg. E. Long. 10. 25. N. Lat. 50. 4.
